section.name: Content of the introduction trainings
section.p: The training service of the E-Learning Competence Center consits of the following modules:

li.b: Communication and Cooperation in the World Wide Web

section.p: The trainings are taking place twice a semester, one at the beginning and the other at the end.

subsection.name: 1. Designing E-Learning Szenarios
subsection.p: In this course the participants will get an overview about the different usage possibilities which E-Learning offers. On represantative examples you will get trained on how E-Learning can be used in your everyday life at university. Along with didactic tips you will get hints on how teachers can offer a secure access to their materials.Additionally you will get an introduction to the xlx System. With the xlx system theachers can offer electronic supported exercises along with theire courses.

subsection.name: 2. Communication and Cooperation in the World Wide Web
subsection.p: Electronic communication and cooperation with students is taking the center stage of this course. The participants of the course are offered a possibillity on how to offer E-Learning materials with the plattform OpenUSS and on how to communicate synchrone and assynchrone with your students. In the second part of the course you will get an overview on how to use the content management plattform HERBIE. With HERBIE students and teachers can work cooperative on science objects.

subsection.name: 3. Designing E-Learning Materials
subsection.p: Electronic materials offer multiple advantages for both teachers and students due to the multimedia content. In this course the participants will learn how to use these adavantages on different learning channels.Furthermore you will get informed on the actual overview on the judical site of how to design and use inoffensive materials.
